report.browser.description: Select Box for the user to select their browser
report.browser.message: Select your Browser and Version - You can get the version by visiting about:support on Firefox or chrome://help

report.bugcount.description: Amount of bug reports user can send

report.button.description: Button to send the information inputed.

report.description.description: Text for the user to write information about the bug.
report.description.message: Provide a link to a live example or an unambiguous set of steps to reproduce this bug.

report.error.description: User needs to input more notification

report.error.unauth.message: Discord account needs to be verified

report.info.description: Tells the user about submitting a bug
report.info.message: Reporting bugs are for bugs within the PreMiD site and the PreMiD Discord Server. Bugs for a presence are to be reported to the creator of the presence. Only report bugs in English.

report.os.description: Select Box for the user to select their operating system
report.os.message: Select your Operating System and Version

report.overview.description: Text for the user to write a brief of the bug information.
report.overview.message: Provide a clear and concise description of what the bug is.

report.toomany.description: User has too many active reports
report.toomany.message: You have too many active reports. Wait for your submitted reports to be reviewed. Reports are checked on a weekly basis, be patient.

report.toomany.alert.description: User has too many active reports
report.toomany.alert.message: You have too many active reports.
